### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, SUM(Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, SUM(Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
LEFT JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
LEFT JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Ingredients.ingredient_name, OrderItems.quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
WHERE Orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount, Ingredients.ingredient_name, OrderItems.quantity, (Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC;

    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

    quantity INTEGER

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Ingredients.ingredient_name, SUM(Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,

    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, SUM(Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity

INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, SUM(Ingredients.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
WHERE Orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date
HAVING total_quantity > 50;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount, Ingredients.ingredient_name, OrderItems.quantity, (Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity

INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Ingredients.ingredient_name, OrderItems.quantity, (Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
WHERE Orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC, total_quantity DESC;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount, COUNT(Ingredients.ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,
    ingredient_id UUID,
    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount, COUNT(Ingredients.ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients
FROM Orders
LEFT JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
LEFT JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
GROUP BY Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Orders.total_amount
HAVING total_ingredients < 3;

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
    ingredient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ingredient_name TEXT,
    quantity INTEGER
);


CREATE TABLE OrderItems (
    order_item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id UUID,

    quantity INTEGER
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Ingredients.ingredient_name, OrderItems.quantity, (Ingredients.quantity * OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity
FROM Orders
INNER JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.order_id = OrderItems.order_id
INNER JOIN Ingredients ON OrderItems.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id
WHERE Orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
AND Orders.total_amount > 500
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
